website_summaries.verdict: A calendar that features a wide variety of beauty products from different popular brands.
pros: Includes products Ayurveda, Sakura, Namaste, and more
Product types include shower scrubs and gels, cleansing foams, body mist, face oil, body cream, night balm, and more
The products are scented nicely without being overwhelming
cons: A bit pricey for small versions of the products

customer_reviews.title: 1 Out Of 3 Was Poorly Packaged & Beat Up
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of these, 1 to keep and 2 to gift. Unfortunately the last was not packaged well & arrived beat up. Even the actual advent inside is beat up. I am waiting for the holiday to use the advent traditionally, but I hear broken pieces rattling inside; no doubt 1 of the candles inside. I love Ritual products & was thrilled to snag a few of these at this low price. The 1st 2 were packaged well, boxes look new & no rattling from inside. I'll keep the banged up advent for myself & hope not to find too many broken pieces as I open my advent this holiday season.
customer_reviews.author: Jamee

product_meta.title: RITUALS The Ritual of Advent 24 Luxurious Bath, Body and Home Gift Set
